text: The shot put event at the 1930 Women's World Games was held in Prague at the Letná Stadium on 6 September 1930. ==Entrants== In August 1930, entrants were published of the athletes of 5 nations: the Netherlands, Sweden, Switzerland, Italy and Great Britain. Listed below are the athletes from these nations who were entered for the shot put event. Nationality Name ==Results== ===Final=== The final took place on 6 September. Rank Name Nationality Distance Notes Grete Heublein 12.49 m Gustel Hermann 12.12 m Liesl Perkaus 11.48 m 4 11.41 m 5 11.21 m 6 Elsa Svensson ==References== Category:Athletics at the 1930 Women's World Games
title: Athletics at the 1930 Women's World Games – shot put
